Accessibility Statement

Last Updated: December 2024

Our Commitment

CostFlowAI is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for all users, including those with disabilities. We strive to meet WCAG 2.2 AA standards.

Accessibility Features

  • Keyboard Navigation: All interactive elements accessible via keyboard
  • Screen Reader Support: Semantic HTML and ARIA labels
  • Focus Management: Clear visual focus indicators
  • Form Labels: All inputs properly labeled and described
  • Live Regions: Calculator results announced to screen readers
  • Skip Links: Quick navigation to main content
  • Color Contrast: Meets WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 minimum)

Assistive Technology Support

Our site is tested with:

  • NVDA screen reader
  • JAWS screen reader
  • VoiceOver (macOS/iOS)
  • Dragon NaturallySpeaking
  • Keyboard-only navigation

Known Issues

We are continuously working to improve accessibility. Currently known issues:

  • Some older blog content may need accessibility improvements
  • Advanced calculator features in development will meet AA standards

Feedback and Support

If you encounter accessibility barriers or need assistance:

  • Email: hello@costflowai.com
  • Subject line: "Accessibility Support"
  • We aim to respond within 2 business days

Alternative Formats

If you need information in an alternative format (large print, audio, etc.), please contact us and we will work to accommodate your needs within 5 business days.

Third-Party Content

Some third-party content (analytics, external links) may not meet our accessibility standards. We work with vendors to improve compliance where possible.

Standards and Guidelines

We follow:

  • Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.2 Level AA
  • Section 508 guidelines
  • ADA Title III compliance principles
